name: Out Rock
description:
Platform SCI FI game made with Godot Engine for the Italian Game Jam #1

Alessandro "silverslade" Schillaci -> Godot programming
Daniele "jackygrom" Sforzin -> 3D Blender modelling

Developed in 7 days, models made with blender, game engine Godot 3.1.1, using all free tools to create it.

Use a gamepad or keyboards (see the main menu for controls)
